title: Martin & Moyce (1952) Dam Break Experimental Data
reference: Martin, J. C., & Moyce, W. J. (1952). Part IV. An experimental study of the collapse of liquid columns on a rigid horizontal plane. Phil. Trans. Roy. Soc. A, 244(882), 312-324.
description: Dimensionless water front position vs dimensionless time for a dam break on a horizontal surface. Initial water column of width 'a' and height 2a collapses under gravity.
notes: Data points are approximate readings from the published graph in Figure 4.
The initial column aspect ratio is 2:1 (height = 2 * width).
Front position is measured from the original back wall of the column.
Experimental uncertainty is approximately +/- 5% on front position.
